DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find out whether the insertion of subcutaneous wound drains has an influence on postoperative hospital stay in ileostomy reversal.
DOC.brief_title: Need for Subcutaneous Wound Drains in Ileostomy Reversal
DOC.criteria: elective open reversal of an protective ileostomy age < 18 years missing suitability to comprehend patient information
